tool.name: qiime feature-table transpose

param.label: --i-table: ARTIFACT FeatureTable[Frequency] The feature table to be transposed. [required]
param.name: itable

tool.help:
Transpose a feature table. ##########################
Transpose the rows and columns (typically samples and features) of a feature table.
Parameters ---------- table : FeatureTable[Frequency] The feature table to be transposed.
Returns ------- transposed_feature_table : FeatureTable[Frequency] The resulting transposed feature table.
